introduction: EXPERIMENTS IN TERROR perversely unearths a celluloid sarcophagus of horrible beauty by delving into the psyches of six different filmmakers. Using visionary cinematography and a masterful montage of rare film artifacts, these amoral auteurs probe every dark corner of the human psyche with morbid curiosity and in lurid detail!This compilation grew from a traveling film festival, Experiments in Terror: The Horror Film and Its Spawn. It includes some from that festival & some others, among them: Outer Space, Ursula, Journey Into the Unknown, The Virgin Sacrifice, Tuning the Sleeping Machine, Dawn of an Evil Millennium
